Dialogue.Dialogue:
Tsk tsk tsk tsk. T tuh tsk TSKK VRZz tsk tsk! (Stick Bug is speaking in bug noises)
(You are given a choice to use a translator or to leave.)
-Leave-
VRRZZZ. Tsk tsk.
-Give a Translator to Stick Bug -
(Skip to "Initial Talk with a Translator (first time)".)

Dialogue.Situation: Initial Talk with a Translator (first time)
Dialogue.Dialogue: Hey there flesh-bug. I am Stick Bug. I move, I jump, I step to my own beat! I was here before the bees and honey. Jump into my world... You think you and your bees can take on me? Think you can match my stide? You'll be over in your head. But I'd like to see you try. Come back if you're brave.

Hey there flesh-bug. Feeling brave? How about you and your friends join me in my dance? Once it starts. I'll hop into the fields. Deal as much damage to me as you can to me in 10 minutes to earn rewards. The higher the score the better they will be. Ready to get down?

- Cancel-
Cold feet? I'll wait.

-Start the challenge -
Ok then - You're on flesh-bug!!
-Pay 50 Tickets to start the challenge-
Ok then - let's groove.

Beesmas is just another day.
Like any other day, it's a day to boogie.
Holidays come and go.
They blow past me like leaves in the wind until they crumble away.
But me and my nymphs, we've been dancing forever.
Heh heh.
(asks if you want to give Stick Bug a Present)
(If you give it a present:)
You're full of surprises , flesh-bug.
Let's take a look in the box.
A reel-to-reel machine? How did you fit this in there?
Very cool. Let me set this up.
...
Now let's give it a whirl.
(Stick Bug Challenge Starts)

You beekeepers are funny with your seasonal traditions. You are given a choice to give a present to Stick Bug or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present. If you're having a tough year, remember things'll get better. Life is full of ups and downs. It's a bumpy ride, just gotta hang on tight. So, what did you bring me? ...(krumple krumple)... Hah! It's a wind-up "Get Stick Bugged" figurine. Yeah, of course I like that meme. Feels good to force even the non-beekeepers to hear my song when they least expect it. Speaking of, you better put this  on the tree fast.

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Requirements:
Collect 9,000,000,000 Pollen from the Pineapple Patch.
Catch 1,000 Petals in the Sunflower Field.
Collect 4,000,000,000 Pollen with Rare Bees.
Collect 6,000 Tokens from Stick Bug.
Collect 5,000 Tokens from Stick Bug Defense Totems.
Discard 20 Beequips.
Use 20 Red Extracts.
Defeat 100 Mechsquitoes.
Defeat 10 Werewolves.
Defeat 4 Aphids.
Defeat 4 Coconut Crabs.
Obtain 1 Walking Stick Nymph Sticker to give to Stick Bug.
Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Rewards:
250B Honey
1 Ticket Voucher
1 Turpentine
1 Pinecone
1 Black Balloon
5 Swirled Waxes
10 Gingerbread Bears
Starts the Stick Bug Challenge
Allows Festive Nymphs to spawn during the Stick Bug Challenge

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
Hey there flesh-bug. Seems like your bees are really enjoying themselves this Beesmas. The Stick Nymphs, though. They're jealous... They've got no Beequips. No Stickers. No nothing. The least we could do is give them some hats. Yeah. Hats make people happy. Heh heh. Let's get some hats for these guys so they'll get back to dancing.
- During -
N/A
- Completion -
That kind of hurt. I'm not complaining. We go  the hats. Now let's take all that stuff you gathered and turn them into hats somehow. Here you go little twigs - looking good. Now that the Stick Nymphs have hats, Festive Nymphs may spawn during challenges you start with me. Festive Nymphs give improved loot, and grant a stack of "Festive Nymph Blessing" when you defeat them. That blessing gives bonus Capacity, Instant Bee Gather Conversion, Honey Per Pollen, and Bee Attack. It stacks up to 250 times and lasts 8 hours. Should be a nice boost to your hive. Seems like the Nymphs are ready to dance.

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Requirements:
Collect 240,000,000,000 Pollen.
Collect 80,000,000,000 Pollen from the Pineapple Patch.
Collect 60,000,000,000 Pollen from the Clover Field.
Collect 20,000,000,000 Pollen from the Dandelion Field.
Collect 1,400 Tokens from Stick Bug.
Collect 1,000 Tokens from Stick Bug Defense Totems.
Catch 1,000 Falling Coconuts.
Discard 40 Beequips.
Collect 120 Enzymes.
Collect 60 Tropical Drinks.
Defeat 1 Stump Snail.
Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Rewards:
2.5T Honey
5 Ticket Planters
1 Turpentine
1 Pinecone
1 Festive Bean
5 Loaded Dice
10 Star Jellies
10 Gingerbread Bears
Starts the Stick Bug Challenge
Allows Festive Nymphs to spawn during the Stick Bug Challenge

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
Hey there flesh-bug. Think you could lend me a hand? The Stick Nymphs really want to get dolled up for the season. But I don't have any festive hats, or the stuff I need to make them. I'm not really a festive sort of bug, and I don't keep a lot of stuff on hand. But just look at those nymphs, so barren and bummed. Could you collect what I need to cheer them up?
- During -
N/A
- Completion -
Now let's take all that stuff you gathered and turn them into hats somehow. Here you go little twigs - the flesh bug's got your back. There. Happy? Now that the stick nymphs have hats, Festive Nymphs may spawn during the challenges you start with me. Festive Nymphs give improved loot, and grant a stack of "Festive Nymph Blessing" when you defeat them. That blessing gives bonus capacity, Instant bee gather conversion, Honey per Pollen and Bee Attack. It stacks up to 250 times and lasts 8 hours. Should be a nice boost to your hive. Seems like the Nymphs are raring to go. How about we test their new hats out.

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Requirements:
Collect 3,000,000,000 Pollen from the Pineapple Patch.
Collect 2,000,000,000 Pollen from the Clover Field.
Collect 1,000,000,000 Pollen from the Dandelion Field
Collect 400 Tokens from Stick Bug.
Collect 200 Tokens from Stick Bug Defense Totems.
Obtain 1 Right Facing Stump Snail Sticker to give to Stick Bug.
Obtain 2 Forward Facing Spider OR 2 Small Blue Chick Stickers to give to Stick Bug.
Obtain 2 Menacing Mantis OR 2 Little Scorpion Stickers to give to Stick Bug.
Obtain 3 Left Facing Ant OR 3 Forward Facing Aphid Stickers to give to Stick Bug.
Obtain 4 Walking Stick Nymph Stickers to give to Stick Bug.

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Requirements (Before Nerf):
Collect 250 Tokens from Stick Bug.
Collect 200 Tokens from Stick Bug Defense Totems.
Defeat 100 Cogmowers.

Defeat 50 Mega Mechsquitos.
If the player has defeated at least 25 Mega Mechsquitos before the nerf, they will get a compensation of 3 Caustic Waxes, 1 Toy Drum, and 1 Ticket Planter.

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
Hey there flesh-bug. I've got a favor to ask of you. The Stick Nymphs have got a bit of a bullying problem. Robo Bear's lackeys  took their festive hats. Really killed their vibe. Robo Bear and I have an arrangement. I can't teach them a lesson myself. But you can. Gotta love loopholes.
- During -
N/A
- Completion -
Heh. That was brutal. Here you go little twigs - the flesh bug got your hats back. There. Happy? Now that the Stick Nymphs have hats, Festive Nymphs may spawn during challenges you start with me. Festive Nymphs give improved loot, and grant a stack of "Festive Nymph Blessing" when you defeat them. That blessing gives bonus Capasity, Instant Bee Gather Conversion, Honey Per Pollen, and Bee Attack. It stacks up to 250 times and lasts 8 hours. Should be a nice boost to your hive. Seems like Nymphs are raring to go. How about we test their new hats out.

Beesmas Quest - Stick Bug's Nymph Hats.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
Hey there flesh-bug. Your bees are looking pretty fresh with their Beesmas Beequips. The Stick Nymphs have definitely noticed. And now they want in on the fashion fun. They're pretty bummed about being left out. Can't even get them to dance. We've got to cheer them up. Think you could help me make some hats for the nymphs? If you do, I'll make it worth your while.
- During -N/A
- Completion -
You pulled through, flesh-bug. These hats'll be a perfect fit. Go ahead Nymphs, try them on. Nice! They look dapper in those things and they're cheering up already. Now that the Stick Nymphs have hats, Festive Nymphs may spawn during challenges you start with me. Festive Nymphs give improved loot and grant a stack of "Festive Nymph Blessing" when you defeat them. That blessing gives bonus Capacity, Instant Bee Gather Conversion, Honey per pollen, and Bee Attack. It stacks up to 250 times and lasts 8 hours. Should be a nice boost to your hive. My Stick Nymphs are happy and raring to go. How about we test their new hats out now.

Other quests.Rewards:
Starts Stick Bug Challenge (upon receiving quest)
5B Honey
5 Tickets
10 Tropical Drinks
 Partridge in a Stick Bug Ornament

Other quests.Dialogue:
- Accepting - 
Hey there flesh bug. Feeling festive? I can get down with that. Beesmas - doesn't mean much to me. But it brings a jolly energy to the mountain that I can certainly vibe with. Been watching you all put  up on that tree. Gave me an idea for an  of my own. I'll tell you more about it later.

- During -
N/A

- Completion -
So, my  There's  this Beesmas song, "The 12 Days of Beesmas" It lists days 12 days , and the first is this: A Partridge in a Pear Tree. I figure since I look sort of like a tree, my ornament could represent that. Here, I made it while we were doing a challenge: The . With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +10% Capacity; +10% Pollen; x1.25 Pollen from the Cactus Field; And x1.25 Pollen from the Pepper Patch. It's a little rough, but I never claimed to be good at arts and crafts. Dance is my art. Happy holidays.

Other quests.Requirements:

Collect 2,500 Tokens from Stick Nymphs.

25,000,000 Honey
5 Marshmallow Bees
5 Micro-Converters
5 Jelly Beans
An Epic Sprout
A Legendary Sprout
A Supreme Sprout

Other quests.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
Hunting for eggs, we do it all the time. You've been hunting for eggs since you got here. Those secrets tucked away, with playful intention. They keep us on our toes- remind us that we don't have it all figured out. Easter eggs are everywhere if you know how to look for them. Here's one that's obvious.
(Stick Bug Challenge Starts)
- During -
(Normal talk after giving Translator)
- Completion -
I've been around so long that not much surprises me. I've got to keep things interesting myself. How about you, flesh bug?
